mapper.select: SELECT ev_expo_id , ev_expo_nm , apct_prod_from_dt , apct_prod_to_dt , expo_from_dt , expo_to_dt , use_yn , (select count(*) from ev_expo where use_yn = 'Y') as cnt , date_format(str_to_date(expo_from_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') - (date_format(str_to_date(expo_from_dt,'%Y-%m-%d'),'%w')),'%Y-%m-%d') as sunday FROM ev_expo WHERE use_yn = 'Y'
